enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group III (WGIII-12) and Thirty-ninth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-39)
sentences: Closing the session, Co-Chair Edenhofer reflected on his last seven years as WGIII Co-Chair as an 'extremely exciting and worthwhile' experience, thanked all the outstanding people he had worked with, particularly WGIII TSU members, and expressed his deepest respect for the authors.
Co-Chair Edenhofer closed the session at 1:12 pm on Saturday, 12 April.
